meanings: (눈에 들어오다) be seen, come in sight, (나타나다) appear
(보여 주다) show (sth to sb / sb sth), display, demonstrate, let sb see, (formal) exhibit

vlive.korean: 보이네. Well, it's visible. 듣기 View video MAGIC STRAWBERRY SOUND : [선우정아] 츤데레 윤철종 of 10cm, 어디가?
아이 눈이 너무 안 보이네? Fans can't see my eyes. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [이한결, 남도현] 누구인가.. 누가 야채샐러드 소리를 내었어...🥗 (HANGYUL&DOHYON talking about their dinner menu)
이제 얘까지 등급으로 보이네... I see him with his grade. 듣기 View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: I see him with his grade.

vlive.korean: 배... 배가 많이 보이네요? Stomach... We can see the stomach well? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스 안녕! 보고싶다 ❤️
vlive.english: Stomach... We can see the stomach well?

vlive.korean: 점이 엄청 잘 보이네요, 그렇죠? I can see the spot on my face really well. Right? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 월요일 유겸이!
vlive.english: I can see the spot on my face really well. Right?
